AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_description: Mapping for books details XML file to CSV file.
AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon" > <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable><xsl:template match="/"><Root><xsl:for-each select = "Root/catalog/book"><Record><xsl:attribute name="recordNumber"><xsl:value-of select="./@id"/></xsl:attribute><Author><xsl:value-of select="author"/></Author><Title><xsl:value-of select="title"/></Title><Price><xsl:value-of select="price"/></Price><Genre><xsl:value-of select="genre"/></Genre></Record></xsl:for-each></Root></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
